title: Immortals: The Immortal Mansion
description: Isabelle Cross has lived her life knowing she was missing something, little did she know what she had been missing is her past and it will take everything she has inside her to get it back. With old and new friends and a moody ex-lover helping her navigate the world she left behind, Isabelle will face her darkest nightmares to get back what was once lost.(re-edited, second edition)
author: Taneshia Jayne Wilson
